Mary Genevieve Doyle

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Burker
  2. Foster Name: Mary
  3. Foster Family: Herman and Sophia Scharfen Kaup
  4. Location of Family: Stuart, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  6. Arrival Place: Stuart, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 2
  8. Date of Birth: 1909-05-04, New York City, NY
  9. Date of Death: 1992-01-07
  10. Gender: female
  11. Married Name: Mary Hamik
  12. Spouse Name: Edward Hamik
  13. Source: "Riders of the Orphan Trains: Nebraska," http://www.usgennet.org/usa/ne/topic/trains/riders.htm; Crossroads 1992, p. 15; Orphan Train Heritage Society of American 1990 Membership Directory; National Orphan Train Complex; Charlotte Endorf and Sarah M. Endorf. Plains Bound: Fragile Cargo: Revealing Orphan Train Reality (Outskirts Press, 2006), p. 18-19; Holt County Historical Society List of Children, p. 3.
